title: Status Description Preparation Workshop
description: For the preparation of the status description, Chaudandigadhi Municipality conducted a one-day status description preparation workshop seminar with the participation of the municipality chief, deputy chief, executive members, chief administrative officer, ward secretaries, thematic branch/sub-branch and unit heads, local level knowledgeable experts or local experts selected by the municipality, to prepare an action plan through discussions to establish shared understanding, comprehension and ownership about the standard format of the status description, source and collection of data, and analysis preparation method among executive officials, employees and stakeholders, and to determine the responsibility and action plan for preparing the status description.
